document_name: GLOBAL COMPACT concept Montenegro FINAL  10 June 2010.doc

outputs.output_descr: The main goal of the project is to harness value-creating assets of the private sector for poverty reduction in Montenegro through promotion of multi-stakeholder partnerships in the framework of Global Compact.

project_descr: Harness value-creating assets of the private sector for poverty reduction in Montenegro through promotion of multi-stakeholder partnerships in the framework of Global Compact.
project_title: CSR and Global Compact in Montenegro
